description:
Why do we have 2 commands in nova-manage (account/project) doing same thing?

nova-manage account create abc
Possible wrong number of arguments supplied
account create: Creates a new project
        arguments: name project_manager [description]

nova-manage account list
projectA
projectB

nova-manage project create abc
Possible wrong number of arguments supplied
project create: Creates a new project
        arguments: name project_manager [description]

nova-manage project list
projectA
projectB
title: nova-manage account and nova-manage project does same

comments.content:
Why do we have 2 commands in nova-manage (account/project) doing same thing?

nova-manage account create abc
Possible wrong number of arguments supplied
account create: Creates a new project
        arguments: name project_manager [description]

nova-manage account list
projectA
projectB

nova-manage project create abc
Possible wrong number of arguments supplied
project create: Creates a new project
        arguments: name project_manager [description]

nova-manage project list
projectA
projectB
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~koolhead17

comments.content: Currently account is alias for project.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ilyaalekseyev
